text: To be eligible, an individual shall:
historical:

sections.text: Be a resident of the District;
Be at least 62 years of age; and
Have a household income that is not more than 200% of the federal poverty level.

chapter.text: Affordability of Prescription Drugs -- AccessRx Program.
